Championship
Salute to Youth
Caird Hall, Dundee, Dundee City, Scotland, UK Qualifiers: Scottish Co-op and Kirkintilloch
Terris Medal (best cornet): Simon Estermann (Scottish Co-op) John Campbell Award (best trombone): Gregor Stewart (Scottish Co-op) Bram Thomson Medal (best horn/flugel): Matthew Maines (horn, Scottish Co-op) James MacMillan Medal (best baritone/euphonium): Richard Kidd (euphonium, Bon Accord) James Hillis Memorial Trophy (best basses): Whitburn
